CustomField.description: Good knowledge of the compliance of the local related authorities. Knowledge of the various types of aircraft or container specifications to guide and advise the team on how to achieve maximum loading capacity Forecast and update on the cost of sea & air freight. Knowledge of the international freight market: best practice, best price, routing expertise, best services

CustomField.label: Market Knowledge
